definition[0]: to secretly go away with someone in order to marry them or live with them – usually used to show disapproval
example[0]: His wife has run away with another man.
definition[1]: if your feelings, ideas etc run away with you, they start to control how you behave
example[1]: Don’t let your imagination run away with you!
definition[2]: if your tongue runs away with you, you say something that you did not intend to say
definition[3]: to think that something is true when it is not
example[2]: Don’t run away with the impression that he doesn’t care.
definition[4]: to win a competition or sports game very easily
example[3]: The Reds ran away with the championship.
